name: gotify
description: Gotify is a self-hosted notification server with WebSocket and REST APIs. Users can send alerts to mobile and desktop via apps or browser interface without relying on third-party notification providers.
features: Push Notifications: Send real-time alerts to mobile and desktop devices without third-party services.
WebSocket Support: Receive instant notifications via WebSocket connections for real-time delivery.
REST API: Simple HTTP API for sending messages from scripts, applications, and services.
Mobile Apps: Native Android app and web interface for receiving notifications on any device.
Message Priority: Set priority levels to control notification behavior and display.
Application Tokens: Generate separate tokens for different services with individual message streams.
Message History: View and search through notification history in the web interface.
Self-Hosted Control: Complete ownership of notification infrastructure without external dependencies.
